name: eexinst01
params: setvar s0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, w1)
-| wex(s0, w2)
-| wi(w0, wi(wex(s0, w2), w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, w1)
-| wex(s0, w2)
-| wi(w0, wi(wex(s0, w2), w1))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(wex(s0, w2), w1))
-| wi(w0, wal(s0, w0))
-| wi(w1, wal(s0, w1))
-| wi(w0, wi(w2, w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, w1)
-| wex(s0, w2)
-| wi(w0, wal(s0, w0))
-| wi(w1, wal(s0, w1))
-| wi(w0, wi(w2, w1))

comment: ~ exinst01 without virtual deductions. (Contributed by Alan Sare, 21-Apr-2013.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
